dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Dawn, I'm an optimist by nature.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but you didn't answer my question. The two continue to make their way across the ship -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you want some advice?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry about what will happen, just concentrate on what is happening.  You'll live longer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Words to live by.

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Barnes closes up his laptop -  He walks across the bridge - soon he notices something -  CLOSE on the EMERGENCY DISTRESS SIGNAL panel, with three moderate code 1, extensive code 2, critical code 3 -  Barnes looks at it for a beat, smiles, then reaches for h He then BLASTS the panel which crackles and emits some bl Barnes laughs -  He then goes over to the monitor -  He presses a button and looks at the monitor - the screen Barnes smile fades -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those idiots... Barnes then presses another button -  POV the monitor shows a WIDE VIEW of the hallway outside Barnes scrutinizes the image -  he sees something he does like - he hits a button -  POV the monitor ZOOMS IN to reveal the doors to the dinin inches -  Barnes frowns at this discovery -

dialogues.speaker: EXT STAR PRINCESS
dialogues.text: Taylor and Dawn continue to crawl across the side of the Just then Taylor sees something -  He gestures to Dawn -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good news.   (pointing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look. Dawn looks in the direction Taylor is pointing -  POV coming into view on the other side of the ship is an

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's intact.  We're one step closer.  Come on. Taylor and Dawn make it closer to the airlock -

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Barnes is checking all the various security camera shots for any movement -  On another monitor, the freighter pilot talks to the  screen -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's time we lock coordinates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, I know. Barnes keeps checking the security monitor - he is now ex the ship -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, what are we waiting for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cool your jets...I'm doing a little damage control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damage control!  What kind of damage? What's going on Barnes! Just then Barnes sees something on the monitor - his eyes POV Taylor and Dawn approaching the airlock -  Barnes SLAMS the console with his fist!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn it!

dialogues.speaker: EXT STAR PRINCESS
dialogues.text: Taylor and Dawn are now in front of the airlock -  Taylor begins to reach for the opening lever -

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Barnes speaks to the pilot -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't do anything until further notice! Barnes then rushes over to a console -

dialogues.speaker: EXT STAR PRINCESS
dialogues.text: The airlock door opens and Taylor makes his way in -  Dawn is about to follow suit when -

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Barnes THROTTLES UP THE ENGINE - the ship begins to ROAR

dialogues.speaker: INT DINING ROOM
dialogues.text: Delbert, Monica, and Jack listen -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The engines!

dialogues.speaker: EXT STAR PRINCESS
dialogues.text: The ship's booster kick in full force -  The ship lurches - suddenly Dawn LOSES HER GRIP and strug

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taylor looks back, sees this -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dawn!  Dawn!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helllp! Taylor rushes out of the airlock and begins to climb fran ship to save Dawn -  Dawn begins to drift away, higher and higher -  Taylor continues to frantically climb -  Dawn struggles to grab the ship but can't reach it -  Taylor approaches the top of the ship -  Dawn continues to rise, rapidly approaching the point of Taylor gets to the top, reaches out to save her - Dawn's boot gets closer to Taylor's hand - Taylor reaches CLOSE on Dawn's boot, too far for Taylor to reach - she s Just then Taylor LEAPS toward Dawn -  He barely manages to grab her ankle -  The two of them drift for a beat until -  Taylor's boot HOOKS under an antenna at the very end of t The two hang there in space -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're safe.  Grab my hand -  CLOSE on Dawn's glove clutching Taylor's -

dialogues.speaker: INT WINE ROOM
dialogues.text: Several empty bottles are strewn around the room -  Anna and Warren appear to be getting very drunk -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we're moving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well isn't that great.  Something to write home about. Warren takes a bottle and HURLS IT across the room - it s Warren then lets out a drunken laugh -  Anna watches him, then follows suit, cackling -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never though I'd be stuck in a wine closet with Warren Wayne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well get used to it, 'cause here we are, on the cruise of a lifetime. Warren approaches her, walking like a robot -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me, miss Koros, how are you  enjoying the trip so far? Anna cracks up at Warren's crude imitation of Mac -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I get you anything?  Some more cheese puffs perhaps... The two of them laugh drunkenly -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm perfectly serious.  I'm here to satisfy your every request here on the cruise of a lifetime.  Just ask, anything you want, anything at all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anna's laughter subsides, and she looks at Warren seducti Warren sees this, and his laughter subsides -  Anna then looks at him with lust -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want you.  Now. Anna then lunges toward Warren and gives him the DEEPEST to man - Warren does not resist -  They crash around the room in an explosion of passion -

dialogues.speaker: INT HALLWAY BY ENGINEERING
dialogues.text: Taylor and Dawn make their way down the hall -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess I owe you a debt of gratitude.  You saved my life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was no time to lose my partner. We're going to have to hurry, he's  on to us.

dialogues.speaker: INT ENGINEERING
dialogues.text: The door opens and Taylor and Dawn enter the room -  They look down -  Dawn gasps, looking at the contorted faces of the dead en

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God.  What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The room is filled with poison gas.  The hydraulic system must have blown. Taylor looks at the men for a beat - he then heads over t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That sick bastard... Taylor hits an AUXILIARY POWER switch on the console - th lights up -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A schematic of the ship.  Looking for a lifeline to the pods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't have enough suits to get the others out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's why we need a safe passage. remember what you said earlier, about getting through the wall? That might just be our ticket. Taylor brings up the floor plans of the ship - functionin others in red -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No look, see that.  One deck up will take you across the damaged lower decks.  There's a bulkhead  here, then over that, one deck down, is a storage room.  That room is adjacent to the dining room. We get through that wall, we get them out to here -  Taylor points to the LIFEPOD AREA on the map -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How are we going to blow the  wall? Taylor looks at Dawn for a beat -  He then climbs up some steps nearby to a small storage ar drawers -  Dawn watches him -  Taylor then grabs up a FLARE from one of the drawers -  He heads down to Dawn and hands it to her -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take this flare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A flare?  A flare won't do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... Taylor takes the C4 out of the pouch on his suit -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But this will. Just attach it to the flare. Taylor hands the C4 to Dawn -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The flare is self igniting, it has a short fuse, so be careful. And remember... Taylor breaks off a tiny piece of the C4 -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little dab'll do ya. Now you know how to get there, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?  Where are you going? Taylor looks at her for a beat -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not going with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?  What are you talking  about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's only room on that pod for seven.  That's you and the  others.  I'm counting on you to get them out of there. Dawn stares at him, dumbstruck -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what are you going to do?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to try and buy you some time.  I can get to the  bridge from here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But how are you going to escape?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry about me.  There's still a chance I can issue a  distress signal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you can't be sure!  It's suicide.  You have to come with us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't! Taylor takes Dawn by the shoulders -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, Dawn.  You have to  stay focused.  Don't unravel on me.  Now you've got to get them to safety!  I'm counting on you. Dawn looks at Taylor -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry about me. (Beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be all right. They look at each other -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now hurry up.  We're running out of time. Dawn heads over to the door -  Taylor approaches a PANEL on the wall -  Dawn pauses at the door -  Taylor and Dawn look at each other for one last beat -  Dawn gestures to the COMMUNICATOR in her helmet -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep in touch. Taylor gestures to his communicator -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will once I get past the bulkhead. (Beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You too. Dawn exits the room and the door closes behind her -  Taylor looks at the door for a beat, then proceeds top op to an AIR SHAFT -  He climbs into the shaft -

dialogues.speaker: EXT STAR PRINCESS
dialogues.text: The ship heads full speed towards the moon -

dialogues.speaker: INT HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Dawn runs down the hallway - she comes to a stop, looks l left -

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: CLOSE on the monitor showing the face of the ship's pilot

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not helping my heart  condition any, Barnes!  Now just  what the hell are you dragging your ass for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others decided to get cute with me, so I'm teaching them a lesson! Barnes looks out the window -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This ship is going down in a  blaze of glory!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well blaze your ass out of there! You've completely altered your  trajectory, are we linking up or not?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry about me, I'm changing coordinates now. (Beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've come to far to be tripped up by some Dudley do-right... motherfuckers!

dialogues.speaker: INT AIR VENT
dialogues.text: Taylor makes his way through the air vent, slowly and car

dialogues.speaker: INT DINING ROOM
dialogues.text: Delbert, Monica, Jack, and Carlo sit in the room -  Carlo struggles to take a breath -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's getting hard to breathe...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just don't move around too much. Carlo looks at him, and heads to the MEN'S ROOM - Jack watches him and shakes his head -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for taking my advice. Monica stands up, looking agitated -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's getting too cold in here. (Beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't stand this anymore!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby, take it easy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How can you sit there with your fat stomach and tell me to take it easy!  I want to go home!  I  want to be warm!  I want to get out of here! Delbert approaches her -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, calm down, getting all  crazy is going to make things  worse. Delbert hugs her and Monica cries - together they sit dow weeps inconsolably -  Delbert hugs her -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's ok... Just then Jack emerges from behind them and drapes a TABL shoulders -  Delbert looks up at Jack, who looks at him -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks. Jack nods his head -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep her warm.

dialogues.speaker: INT WINE ROOM
dialogues.text: Warren and Anna are now naked as they ATTACK each other p

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Warren...oh Warren...take me, God take me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Sara...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anna...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anna...

dialogues.speaker: EXT STORAGE HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Dawn approaches a door marked STORAGE - she hits a panel door opens -  She enters the room -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She approaches the far wall - she feels it with her hand

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This must be it. (Beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taylor come in.  Can you hear  me?                                 There is no response -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn. Dawn then takes the C4 and the flare out of the pouch on

dialogues.speaker: INT AIR SHAFT
dialogues.text: Taylor continues to navigate his way through the air  shaft -  He looks ahead -  POV in the distance some LIGHT can be seen through a grat Taylor presses some buttons on the forearm of his suit - Taylor then slides up the protective face plate on the he crawl -  Suddenly Taylor perks up - he hears something up ahead -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (far away, muffled)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know that! Taylor likes what he hears - he begins to crawl faster to

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Barnes is talking to the pilot on the monitor -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well if you knew it then why did set your thrusters on before making the calculation?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you, I had to teach a few people a lesson!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamn it Barnes this really steams my onions!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get something straight,  Chappy!

dialogues.speaker: INT AIR SHAFT
dialogues.text: Taylor gingerly approaches the grate and looks down -  POV the far end of the bridge is visible -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't take orders from you, you take orders from me! You got that? Struggling not to make a sound, Taylor bites his lip and

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Barnes addresses the monitor -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now I got enough air and supplies to make another complete orbit in the pod!  You're just gonna have to pick me up later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a major screw up on your part, goddamn it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then why don't I tell you something, good buddy?  I don't need to listen to shit from you! Now you want to call it off fine, I'll take the risk of re-entry but you're out of the picture, understand? The pilot says nothing -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now we'll regroup in 24 hours, tell whoever you need to you're extending the trip, and pick me up accordingly. Is that clear? The pilot says nothing -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that clear?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's clear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good.  Now you'll hear from me when I have the new coordinates. In the meantime don't bug me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sheesh!  Aye aye cap'n!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over and out! Barnes disconnects the transmission -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Idiot...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good help is hard to find... Barnes SPINS around -  He is face to face with Taylor, who SMASHES Barnes across laptop -  Barnes spins around and collapses to the floor, blood run Taylor gives him a ferocious KICK to the head for good me He then looks over and sees Reynolds, dead -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Jesus...

dialogues.speaker: INT STORAGE ROOM
dialogues.text: Dawn carefully places the C4 and the flare against the  wall -  Just then her communicator crackles to life -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dawn.  Come in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taylor!  Where are you?

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Taylor surveys the damage on the bridge -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm in the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barnes? Taylor looks down at an unconscious Barnes -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's out of the equation.   (Beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Talk to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm about to blow the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry.  You have to get them  out of there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How does the distress signal look?

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Taylor looks at the completely destroyed distress signal

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, it's ok, everything's going  to be ok...now I'm counting on you, and whatever you do keep calm, we don't want them to panic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll do my best.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what's going to happen to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm staying with the ship.  I'll be all right.  Now hurry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for everything, Taylor. Will I see you again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hopefully sooner than later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sooner than later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over and out. Taylor shuts off the communicator - he reflects on the co then approaches the destroyed distress signal panel -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That son of a bitch...

dialogues.speaker: INT STORAGE ROOM
dialogues.text: Dawn looks at the C4 and the fuse -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here goes...nothing... Dawn rips the fuse open on the flare -  It begins to spark -  Dawn then looks around -  She spots some BARRELS in the corner -  She rushes over to them and ducks for cover -  She watches the fuse as it burns down... LOWER... LOWER... Dawn closes her eyes....then suddenly -  BOOM!!!  A HUGE EXPLOSION tears a gigantic hole on the wa everywhere -  Dawn shields herself - the sound of SMASHING BOTTLES can

dialogues.speaker: INT DINING ROOM
dialogues.text: Jack spins around -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell was that?? Jack RACES over to the wine room door - Delbert and Monic

dialogues.speaker: INT WINE ROOM
dialogues.text: Jack rips open the door - he is stunned by what he sees a There is an enormous HOLE in the wall -  He looks to the other side of the room, around a counter Anna and Warren roll out from behind it, STARK NAKED -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell! Just then Dawn emerges from the hole -  She too sees Anna and Warren, who fumble for their clothe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell! Jack sees Dawn -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is happening around here!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no time to explain.  Get  everyone together!  We found a way to the pods!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Taylor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's up on the bridge!  He's going to be OK.  Now who's missing? Jack looks around - Anna and Warren hastily finish gettin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just Carlo. Jack faces the dining room -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carlo?

dialogues.speaker: INT DINING ROOM
dialogues.text: The group files out of the wine room -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carlo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's in the bathroom. Jack heads toward the bathroom -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carlo! The others follow -

dialogues.speaker: INT MEN'S ROOM
dialogues.text: Jack pushes the door open - his eyes widen -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no! Monica approaches, looks ahead, and screams -  POV Carlo SWINGS from a makeshift noose of cloth towels - The others enter as Jack rushes over to him -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Jesus Christ... Jack lifts Carlo up by the legs and removes him from the to the floor -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is he dead? Jack checks for a pulse then grimly looks at Dawn and nod Dawn turns away and heads back into the dining room -

dialogues.speaker: INT DINING ROOM
dialogues.text: Dawn stares at the ground for a beat - she then looks bac turns away -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God damn it... Something then dawns on her - she looks forward, then tur the others -

dialogues.speaker: INT BATHROOM
dialogues.text: Dawn approaches the others -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, we're running out of time. We have to jettison as soon as  possible or we'll be out of  the gravitational pull.  Come on... The others look at her for a beat, then file out -  Jack remains, looking down at Carlo, then back up at Dawn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There was nothing you could have done.   (Beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The thing to do now is save yourself. Carlo looks at Dawn, then back at Carlo -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm right behind you... Dawn backs out of the room -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry. Dawn exits -  Jack shakes his head and stands up, looking down on Carlo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You stupid kid, you were so close... (Beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You stupid kid... Jack slowly backs out of the room, then turns and walks  out -

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Taylor struggles to fix the wiring around the distress si increasingly frustrated -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamn it... Just then, behind him, Barnes slowly begins to come to - bearings -  He spots the gun close by -  Taylor continues to work on the console -  Barnes gets hold of the gun - he raises it up and aims at BARNES' POV through double vision, he sees Taylor  working -  Barnes holds the gun out and BLAMMMM!! He fires, missing Taylor - Taylor spins around and POUNCE

dialogues.text: Dawn leads the others through the debris-strewn hallway t lifepod  -

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Taylor and Barnes crash around the room as Taylor struggl Barnes' hand -  They scuffle toward the bridge door -  Taylor SLAMS Barnes against a panel, and the bridge door

dialogues.speaker: INT HALLWAY TO LIFEPOD
dialogues.text: Dawn, Jack, Delbert, Monica, Warren and Anna rush down th Dawn looks back at the others -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry!

dialogues.speaker: INT LIFEPOD ENTRANCE
dialogues.text: Dawn and the others approach the pod door -  Dawn presses some buttons on a WALL CONSOLE next to the  pod -  The pod door opens - Dawn looks back at the others -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody in!  Come on!

dialogues.speaker: INT LIFEPOD
dialogues.text: Monica, Anna, Delbert, Jack, and Warren all enter the lif They begin hastily fastening themselves in -

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Taylor SMASHES Barnes' wrist across the doorjamb - the gu

dialogues.speaker: INT HALLWAY BY BRIDGE
dialogues.text: The gun rattles across the floor -  Barnes leaps toward it and turns around training it on Ta Taylor DIVES as Barnes fires - BLAM BLAM BLAM BLAM!!! He hits a pipe which BURSTS FORTH a dense jet of smoke wh blocking Barnes' vision -  Taylor watches this, and in the split second that follows He grabs up a piece of broken ceiling panel on the ground direction of an observation  window -  Barnes sees the motion, FIRES -  BLAM!!! The bullet SHATTERS the window as everything gets Taylor FLIES ACROSS THE FLOOR stopping himself by grabbin second -  Barnes SMASHES against the window struggling to anchor hi Taylor watches as Barnes is SUCKED out the window along w fading scream fills the hallway as Taylor seals his mask EXT STAR PRINCESS - Barnes shoots out the window and stru as he disappears into the icy black void -

dialogues.speaker: INT LIFEPOD
dialogues.text: Jack looks at Dawn, who has yet to get in -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you waiting for?!  Come on! Dawn looks down the hall, then back at Jack -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going back for Taylor!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you nuts!  It's too risky!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He told you what to do!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He didn't know there was room! Initiate the blastoff!  We'll be back in five minutes! Jack stares at her for a beat -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five minutes! Dawn runs down the hallway -  Jack sets the timer for 5 minutes and hits ENGAGE -

dialogues.speaker: INT DIFFERENT HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Dawn runs down the hallway, avoiding fallen debris -

dialogues.speaker: INT LIFEPOD
dialogues.text: Close on the others as they watch the countdown -  4:30...4:29...4:28...

dialogues.speaker: EXT STAR PRINCESS
dialogues.text: Dawn climbs across the hull of the ship -

dialogues.speaker: INT LIFEPOD
dialogues.text: The countdown continues -  3:45...3:44...3:43... Delbert looks at it -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're not gonna make it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not time yet! Everyone anxiously watches the countdown -

dialogues.speaker: INT HALLWAY NEAR BRIDGE
dialogues.text: An AIRLOCK opens and Dawn emerges - she rushes toward the

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Taylor struggles to repair the controls - Just then the b Taylor spins around - Dawn enters the room -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have room!  Let's go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean?  What happened!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't have time.  I'll explain later, hurry! Taylor looks at her for a beat, then grabs his helmet -

dialogues.speaker: INT LIFEPOD
dialogues.text: The countdown continues -  Warren looks at the countdown -  3:26...3:25...3:24...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddammit where are they?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give them time!

dialogues.speaker: EXT STAR PRINCESS
dialogues.text: Taylor and Dawn make their way across the ship -

dialogues.speaker: INT HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Taylor and Dawn emerge from a gaping hole in the hallway

dialogues.text: The countdown continues -  1:46...1:45...1:44... The others watch -

dialogues.speaker: INT DAMAGED HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Dawn and Taylor rush down the hall -

dialogues.speaker: INT LIFEPOD
dialogues.text: The countdown continues -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus, come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're not going to make it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're not going to make it. Jack then looks at the countdown  31...30...29... Jack's face sinks -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're not going to make it.

dialogues.speaker: INT HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Taylor and Dawn rush down the hall -

dialogues.speaker: INT LIFEPOD
dialogues.text: The countdown continues -  6...5...4... CLOSE on the individual faces of the passengers - Jack, W Monica -

dialogues.speaker: INT LIFEPOD HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Taylor and Dawn enter just as -  A LOUD BUZZING NOISE pierces the air and a red light fill

dialogues.speaker: INT LIFEPOD
dialogues.text: CLOSE on the counter...1...0

dialogues.speaker: EXT STAR PRINCESS LIFE POD
dialogues.text: A series of SMALL EXPLOSIONS blast the life pod away from

dialogues.text: The passengers hold on for dear life as the pod SHUDDERS

dialogues.speaker: EXT SPACE
dialogues.text: The pod HURTLES through space, headed toward Earth in the

dialogues.speaker: INT LIFEPOD HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Taylor and Dawn stand there, dejected -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: INT LIFEPOD
dialogues.text: Jack looks out of a small window -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God help them. POV of the window, with the Star Princess disappearing in

dialogues.speaker: INT LIFEPOD HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Taylor and Dawn watch the pod disappear through a window

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So close...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And so far. Taylor looks at Dawn -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's only one thing left  to do.

dialogues.speaker: EXT STAR PRINCESS
dialogues.text: The ship begins to approach the moon at a rapid speed -

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Taylor and dawn enter the bridge -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strap yourself in!  Hurry!

dialogues.speaker: EXT STAR PRINCESS
dialogues.text: The ship gets closer and closer to the moon -

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Dawn and Taylor hastily secure themselves to their respec

dialogues.text: The ship spins as it approaches the surface of the moon -

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Taylor and Dawn tightly clench the consoles, bracing for The surface gets closer...CLOSER... Dawn shuts her eyes -

dialogues.speaker: EXT MOON
dialogues.text: CRASSHHHHH!!! The ship COLLIDES with the surface, leaving slides across the ground -

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Taylor and Dawn hold on for dear life as the ship violent surface -

dialogues.speaker: EXT MOON
dialogues.text: Soon the ship grinds to a halt on the surface, a burned, former self - The charred remnants of the "Star Princess" again, it is silent -

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Taylor comes to -  He looks around the bridge, gets his bearings -  He unfastens himself and gets up - he feels his head, loo He then approaches Dawn, who is also unconscious -  He looks at her for a beat -  POV she looks beautiful in the light -  Taylor crouches down and gently shakes her -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dawn... Slowly, she comes to -  Dawn slowly opens her eyes and looks around - the only th of a bridge engine -  Taylor and Dawn look at each other -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you all right? Dawn gets her bearings, then looks at Taylor -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As if it matters. Dawn unfastens herself -   Taylor gets up - he heads over to a window -  Dawn approaches him - he looks out -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well...we made it.  There it is. Dawn looks out the window -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just the way I thought it would look. A forlorn expression crosses her face - Taylor looks grim Just then Dawn begins to cry - Taylor faces her -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are we going to do? Taylor embraces her - she cries on his shoulder -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhhh... Taylor holds her tightly, Dawn does the same as she cries Taylor presses the side of his face against hers -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhh... Slowly their faces get closer to one another -  They pull back slightly and look at one another - Taylor Dawn's eye -  He then gently kisses her forehead, then her cheek -  They then look at one another for a beat -  Then, very softly, they kiss - the kissing becomes more i and hug each other for dear life -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never thought this would happen.  No premonitions, nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It did.  It is.  There's nothing we can do about that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Except write our wills. Taylor looks at Dawn for a beat -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd like to do something before that. Dawn looks at Taylor, not quite sure what he means -  Taylor looks directly into Dawn's eyes -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you marry me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marry you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right.  Will you marry me? Dawn looks at him for a beat -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would, but no one can perform the ceremony.  I guess it doesn't matter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It would matter to us. They look at each other for a beat -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In that case, I accept.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good.  In that case, I pronounce us man and wife. Taylor and Dawn then kiss - Dawn wipes some tears away -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about a ring? Taylor looks around the room - he sees something -  CLOSE on the half smoked corona sitting on the edge of a it is still intact -  Taylor removes the band and approaches Dawn -  Dawn extends her hand and Taylor slips the ring on -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all I could do on such  short notice. The two look at each other gravely - then embrace as if f

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go for a walk. Dawn looks at him -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, for our honeymoon.

dialogues.speaker: EXT MOON SURFACE
dialogues.text: Together in their respective space outfits, the two lone magnificent vista -  They stop and look ahead -  They see Earth in the distance -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right now it's about 8 o'clock at home.  People are going to  work, kids are going to school...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try not to think about it. Dawn looks at Earth and lets out a long, forlorn sigh -  Just then something catches her eye - she turns -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God... Taylor look at her, then turns in the direction she's loo POV a small CRAFT approaches from far away -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God... The two begin to walk toward the direction of the approac Like little ants on the surface, we see Taylor and Dawn a landscape -  The ship gets closer and closer -  Taylor and dawn rush toward it -  The ship gets closer and closer - soon a small WINDOW bec

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know.  Wave to them! Taylor and Dawn begin flailing their arms -  The ship gets closer and closer - soon the image of some becomes visible -  Taylor and dawn rush toward the craft, which prepares to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They see us!  They know we're  here! The ship's landing gear lowers, and a series of boosters final landing -  Taylor and Dawn continue to wave -  The people in the window become visible -  POV we see a SHIP'S CAPTAIN look at them and wave -  Taylor and dawn wave back, elated -  Then Taylor notices something in the window - he squints his eyes widen -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It can't be... POV we see MAC looking out the window - he sees Taylor an smiling faintly -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is! The ship lands - Taylor and Dawn hug, jumping up and down The door to the ship opens -  Taylor and Dawn approach - a CREW MEMBER in a spacesuit g

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you all right? Taylor and Dawn nod -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are there any others? Taylor looks back at the Star Princess, then back at the shakes his head "no" -  The crew member gestures to the two -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on aboard. Taylor and Dawn approach the door, and slowly enter the  ship -  The ship door closes -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And so we were saved.  The freighter found Mac floating through the  void, quite by accident, and through this simple twist of fate two  little people made it off the moon. The ship lifts off, and leaves the moon -  The twisted wreckage of the Star Princess can be seen in ship ascends -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Later we would find out the lifepod made it safely back to earth, where the adventures  of Anna Koros and Warren Wayne became the tabloid story of the year. The ship turns and heads away -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As for Ryan Taylor and me, we decided to stay married after all, although we got new rings. (Beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But for the time being, it was time  to head back to the comforting bonds  of a small blue planet called home. The ship heads toward Earth -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It never looked so beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: THE END
